body.p: Enabling to obtain Kindle output from DITA Maps, requires KindleGen. To download KindleGen, go to www.amazon.com/kindleformat/kindlegen and select the zip file that matches your operating system. Unzip the file on your local disk. After you download and unzip KindleGen, open the Kindle transformation type, select Edit, and go to the Parameters tab. Set the kindlegen.executable parameter as the path to the KindleGen directory.
